content.rendered:
Lots of bug fixes and surprises are in store for you when you upgrade to Piklist v0.9.9.4:

  • NEW: WorkFlow Bar!
  • NEW: Save individual Options, not just serialized Settings. (check out the new “Demo Reading” page)
  • NEW: Two new conditions: ‘readonly’ and disabled’.
  • NEW: unset_value option for checkboxes.
  • ENHANCED: Major speed updates to Piklist JS UI. This includes Add-mores, Conditions, etc.
  • ENHANCED: Removed old responsive_admin() function.
  • ENHANCED: Dragging the editor in add-mores is easier.
  • ENHANCED: New Datepicker skin.
  • ENHANCED: Validation and Sanitization updates.
  • FIX: Lots of bug fixes to Group fields and Validation and Sanitization.

We’re also making the minimum WordPress version required v4.0.

Download v0.9.9.4 from WordPress.org trunk, and please test, test, test.
